description: two young men at right, wearing suits; young man at right peers over the top of a hat; young man at left holds a hat in front of his face and is seated on a plaid pail; another young man seen from back at LLC; bearded man to right of last young man; seated children at left; same image as L2005.98.40
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription and Stamp

on back, on back, in pencil: [1954 BROOKLYN, NEW YORK - USA
title: 1954, Brooklyn, New York, U.S.A.
